summary: REQ-1 asks for a very narrow change: update text content of exactly five specific emoji <span> elements in the accepted view, with no other UI/text/behavior changes. The diff shows broad changes to App.tsx (new burst/evasive-button logic, refs/state, etc.) and does not provide direct code evidence that only those five spans were edited. Additional non-requested features appear to have been implemented.
